entry.title: Wednesday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
